div.span:
Perl regular expressions, oXygen XML Editor
for converting old HTML without end-tags to XML
for marking collation chunk boundaries in source files

XSLT
for resequencing margin notes
for organizing text files into 'chunks' for collation
For 'flattening' the markup for collation.
Collation of five versions of Frankenstein

Python
for preparing the tokenizing and normalizing algorithm + instructing CollateX

CollateX
Python-based library for locating alignments and divergences in pairwise comparison of text strings
Output XML format of a single file holding information about all five source texts and where they align and diverge from each other.
Prepare the Spine and 5 edition files from collation output

XSLT postCollation pipeline
Series of XSLTs: transforms collation XML output into Spine file + 5 edition files

Python for Levenshtein edit distance calculations
find the maximum value of all pairwise comparisons at each variant location

XSLT Pull data from the Python edit-distance output
Apply to spine file and to create hotspots in the edition files
XSLT to prepare the Interactive Variorum Heatmap in SVG

XSLT for preparing the data for the interface
Split into letter/chapter-size unit files
Transform the spine from XML to JSON

React + Astro JavaScript
Pull the XML data into JSON structures for web interface delivery
